EmailTemplate.name: School Bus Service
EmailTemplate.subject: School Bus Service
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Guangzhou
Dear School Bus Families, I hope you are well and are enjoying the final days of your summer break. We’re pleased to announce that the ‘School Bus Schedule for 2014/15’ is now available through our website (www.bsg.org.cn) or by CLICKING HERE. When viewing bus schedules, please kindly note: - ‘L’ indicates a ‘Lakefront Campus’ bus for children in Pre-Nursery, Nursery or Reception. - ’N’ indicates a ‘South Lake Campus (Nan Hu)’ bus for children in Year 1 or above. Should you have any questions regarding the school's bus service, please contact Claire Guo (Claire@bsg.org.cn) at your convenience. Best wishes, Ms. Claire Guo Bus Coordinatior
